markdownRemark.html:
SDG

I worked on the theme for the SDG homepage back in 2014. The site has changed a lot since my time there, but the general design is the same.

Pietown

I built a site for Pietown, a television production company, back in 2013. It involved porting a custom PHP application to Drupal and enhancing its functionality. This site is used to showcase the programs Pietown produces and to manage user applications to be featured on those shows.

Deludenoid v1

I built the first iteration of Deludenoid back in 2013. This version featured some funny homemade comics. It is no longer publicly available but here is a screenshot of its former glory.

Deledenoid v2

I built Deludenoid v2 for my wife a couple years ago. She wanted an application where users could upload their own images which would then be displayed in a view on the homepage.
